com.efnilite.redaktor.wrapper

Interface RedaktorPlayer<T extends org.bukkit.command.CommandSender>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The instance of who to send messages to if actions are completed.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BukkitPlayer, ConsolePlayer

    public interface RedaktorPlayer<T extends org.bukkit.command.CommandSender>
    An interface for objects that can use Redaktor commands. In this case those are ConsolePlayer and BukkitPlayer
